sqlMap.select: SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND B.DIR_ID = #dirId# AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# AND BB.item_type=1

SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300'
B.DIR_ID in (select dir_id from directory where fa_dir_id = #dirId# or dir_id=#dirId#)
AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# left join item_sort its on AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = its.item_code and its.item_type = 1 and its.sort_type = 1 and its.tenant_id = #tenantId# order by sort_no desc,prod_offer_id desc limit #startRow#,#pageSize#

SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300'
B.DIR_ID in (select dir_id from directory where fa_dir_id = #dirId# or dir_id=#dirId#)
AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() AND A.EFF_DATE >= date_sub(curdate(),interval 7 day) ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# AND BB.item_type=1 ORDER BY AA.EFF_DATE DESC,AA.PROD_OFFER_ID DESC limit #startRow#,#pageSize#

SELECT count(*) FROM reg_stat_recent R, ( SELECT DISTINCT A.service_id, A.api_name, S.service_code, A.times_price FROM service S, api A WHERE S.service_id = A.service_id ) SA WHERE R.intf_code = SA.service_code
SELECT * FROM prod_offer p, prod_offer_type o WHERE p.cooperation_type IN ('13') AND p.status_cd != '1300' AND p.offer_type = o.cd AND p.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# ORDER BY p.prod_offer_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT o.name FROM prod_offer p, org o WHERE o.org_id = p.offer_provider_id AND o.org_id = #orgId#
SELECT * FROM api WHERE service_id IN ( SELECT service_id FROM service_product_real WHERE product_id IN ( SELECT product_id FROM offer_prod_rel WHERE prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# ) )
SELECT * FROM offer_catalog_location ocl, directory d WHERE ocl.dir_id = d.dir_id AND ocl.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId#

SELECT C.DIR_NAME FROM `directory` C WHERE C.TENANT_ID = 1 AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.dir_id = ( SELECT d.dir_id FROM offer_catalog_location ocl, DIRECTORY d WHERE ocl.dir_id = d.dir_id AND ocl.prod_offer_id = #prodOfferId# )
select C.DIR_ID,C.FA_DIR_ID,C.S_FILE_ID,C.DIR_NAME,C.DIR_CODE,C.TENANT_ID from `directory` C where C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6'
sqlMap.update: update ITEM_CNT set PAGE_VIEW= #pageView# where ITEM_CODE = #itemCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT AA.*, ifnull(BB.PAGE_VIEW,0) PAGE_VIEW, ifnull(BB.COLLECT_CNT,0) COLLECT_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND B.DIR_ID IN ( SELECT t.dir_id FROM `directory` t WHERE t.fa_dir_id = #dirId# ) AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA LEFT JOIN ITEM_CNT BB ON AA.PROD_OFFER_ID = BB.item_code AND BB.tenant_id = #tenantId# AND BB.item_type=1

SELECT COUNT(1) api_offer_cnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.* FROM PROD_OFFER A, offer_catalog_location B, `directory` C WHERE A.prod_offer_id = B.prod_offer_id AND B.dir_id = C.dir_id AND A.COOPERATION_TYPE = '13' AND A.STATUS_CD != '1300'
B.DIR_ID in (select dir_id from directory where fa_dir_id = #dirId# or dir_id=#dirId#)
AND A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND B.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND C.DIR_STATE = 'A' AND C.DIR_TYPE = '6' AND A.exp_date >= NOW() ) AA
SELECT s.service_code FROM api a, service s WHERE a.service_id = s.service_id AND a.api_id = #apiId#
